h

Krk

2247. Wayne 87 
Angola, Ind

No.18,1911 
My dear 20 Stara

Gaur letter of last 
Monito has been received some 
time ago. I thank you ever 
so much for your compliment, 
Am so happy to learn that 
My english is improving Peally

Å do not notice it. But anyway 
I try my best to write and to 
speak correctly

I never dream that 
everything is going to change an
raw: 1956 h Krk 2247. Wayne 87 Angola, Ind No.18,1911 My dear 20 Stara Gaur letter of last Monito has been received some time ago. I thank you ever so much for your compliment, Am so happy to learn that My english is improving Peally Å do not notice it. But anyway I try my best to write and to speak correctly I never dream that everything is going to change an

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter thanking Stearns for his compliment on Luk's English. Luk comments on the improvements at Phillips Academy. He comments on the war between Italy and Turkey. He regrets that he has not heard from home and does not know what is happening in Tientsin.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
